name: 📲 represent
description:
Bring your Design seamlessly to Smartphones and Desktops.


Simply review designs. Seamlessly, live and remote directly on your or clients devices without leaving Figma.


🌍 Worldwide Sharing

Share your Designs with one click to your clients - no WiFi or USB cable required.


🔐 256-bit SSL secured

Protected by High Secure-Sockets-Layers.


🗑 No Datasaving

Respecting your creativity and privacy.


⚡️ Lightning Fast

Ultra crispy design previews to everybody.


⏱ No Signup needed

Join without sign up.


🎨 Better Understanding

Design Reviews directly on client‘s devices.


☠️ Goodbye, Mockups

Creating Mockups was yesterday.
